item.description:
Looks like it may warm up next week so I'm going to get another event in on Sunday. I plan to ski for a couple of hours and then have lunch in the lodge.

Those who may be new to XC skiing or who have not been on skis in a while are welcome. We will not leave you behind!

Windblown is the ultimate New England cross country ski experience with a wonderful lodge, bring your lunch or buy it there (I'm pretty sure they will have the cafe fully open but call to be sure if you are not bringing lunch.)

I'll start at 10 am and will be just outside the lodge at the ski rack ready to ski. I'll be wearing a navy blue jacket that says SWIX on it and will start skiing at 10:10. Arrive in time to buy your trail pass and get ready to ski before we meet.

Allow at least 1.5 hours driving time from the Boston area. Trail passes are $18--CASH OR CHECK ONLY. Rentals available

Contact each other for carpooling you can use the discussion board!

group.name: The Boston Cross-Country Skiing and Snowshoe Meetup Group

item.name: Windblown XC Ski
